title: Complement Rule
text: This question is asking for the complement rule. We are essentially asked the probability that a cookie does not contain chocolate or nuts, which can be expressed mathematically as P(NOT(C OR N)) and using complement notation (with the apostrophe), this can be simplified to P((C OR N)'), or the complement of what we found in the previous step.
